imdb.title: Radiant
imdb.plot: Synopsis Seth is an aspiring sorcerer from the Pompo Hills area. Like all wizards, he is an "infected," one of the few living beings who survived the contact of the Nemesis--creatures fallen from the sky that contaminate and decim...

episodes.title: Toward a New Adventure -Overture-
episodes.plot: Seth returns home and tells Alma of his encounter with the mysterious man during his battle with Konrad, but Alma isn't buying it.

episodes.title: An Encounter in the Rain -Mist-
episodes.plot: Seth sets out for the capital but gets intercepted by a Merchant-Baron airship. Seth barely escapes thanks to Grimm, and successfully reaches the capital where he encounters Doc and Melie.

episodes.title: The City of Knights -Caislean Merlin-
episodes.plot: After attempting to enter the castle's archives, Seth gets kicked out! Seth is later introduced to Ocoho and joins her in battle.

episodes.title: The Bringer of Calamity -Dullahan-
episodes.plot: Seth and Ocoho face off against a powerful Spectral Nemesis band while attempting to protect a small farm from destruction.

episodes.title: Silent Rain, Distant Hearts -Rain-
episodes.plot: Seth tracks down Melie and Doc at the Luchorpan Inn, and attempts to make amends with them.

episodes.title: His Name Is -Diabal-
episodes.plot: Guided by a reoccurring dream, Seth attempts to sneak into the archives at Caislean Merlin. Here, he learns a dark truth about the origins of the Spectral Nemesis.

episodes.title: The Spectre Battle -Spectre-
episodes.plot: Seth hangs on for dear life as he attempts to escape the Diabal's grasp. Meanwhile, Grimm is badly wounded in an altercation.

episodes.title: Seth in the Forest of Time -Caillte-
episodes.plot: Seth narrowly escapes the castle, but is badly wounded. Melie senses that Seth is in trouble and heads out with Doc and Ocoho to search for him.

episodes.title: The Palace of Schemes -Palace-
episodes.plot: Ocoho and Melie are blamed for disobeying orders in the previous battle, but Mordred saves them by telling the queen that it was all Lord Brangoire's mistake. Seth, meanwhile, continues training so that he can learn to control his power.

episodes.title: The Qualifications of a Knight -Quality-
episodes.plot: Seth continues his rigorous training with Myr and Jill so that he can control his powers. Meanwhile, the Knight-Sorcerers are forced to accept the aid of Lord de Guilis during an emergency operation on an approaching Nemesis threat.

episodes.title: Now, Feel the World -Resonance-
episodes.plot: Seth is still unable to control his rampaging power. He tries to suppress it, but only ends up closer to being completely engulfed by it. But by thinking about all the bonds and relationships he's forged up to this point, Seth experiences an awakening!

episodes.title: The Truth Is Like a Curse -Ocoho-
episodes.plot: As the town bustles in preparation for the upcoming ordination ceremony, Ocoho leaves quietly, avoiding being seen. Lord Brangoire grows suspicious of her behavior and attacks her. Melie stops him, but is shocked by Ocoho's actions!

episodes.title: Your decision -Knighthood-
episodes.plot: Dragunov and Liselotte meet with Doussant of the Merchant Barons, who proposes an alliance that could help the Inquisition that would mean the neutralization of Fantasia. Meanwhile, Ocoho seeks the truth about who is using her curse to make the Spectre Nemesis appear.

episodes.title: The Final Battlefield -Battlefield-
episodes.plot: The Inquisition invasion begins. Boudica puts up an impressive defense, but her knights are unable to break through the Fantasia Vacuum generated by the Inquisition's new machine.

episodes.title: Led to the Abyss by a Melody of Death -Harmonizium-
episodes.plot: The Inquisition starts wrecking the knights, largely thanks to their new fantasia nullification device. Seth wins over Piodon, then gets intercepted by Dragunov on his way to join the battle and help Ocoho.

episodes.title: The Light of Life is Extinguished -Tragedy-
episodes.plot: Mordred had infiltrated Caislean Merlin as a child and spent his life there creating chaos in anticipation of this day, all on his father's orders. His father, Baron Doussant, has been working toward the goal of making all infected people into slaves.

episodes.title: The Black Dragon Descends -Pen Draig-
episodes.plot: Layers of deception are revealed as the battle between the Thaumaturges and the Inquisition rages on. The battleship Uranos descends onto the battlefield, a move that even gives Dragunov pause.

episodes.title: The Will of the People Shines Bright -Resistance-
episodes.plot: Seth and Santori battle it out. Meanwhile, the others are engaging in battles of their own!

episodes.title: I Can't Hear Your Voice -Myrddin-
episodes.plot: As the battles come to an end, a new threat emerges that could destroy the forest!

episodes.title: Mahôtsukai no shônen -Seth-
episodes.plot: Seth is a boy who lives in the remote village of Pompo Hills. He spends his days training to be a great sorcerer, but he's always messing up.

episodes.title: Hontô no yûki -Bravery-
episodes.plot: A group of sorcerers appears in the village and seals the Nemesis's movements. Seth has never met any other sorcerers besides Alma and is immediately taken with them. Hoping to prove that he can be of use too, Seth asks if he can work with them.

episodes.title: Tabidachinohi -Alma-
episodes.plot: No matter how often Alma explains that sorcerers and ordinary humans don't understand each other, Seth just can't accept it. So, to stop people from seeing sorcerers as the bad guys, Seth swears to destroy all the Nemesis.

episodes.title: Ôzora no deai -Encounter-
episodes.plot: Seth heads for Artemis Academy to learn more about Radiant. On the way, he runs into Captain Dragunov of the Inquisition, an organization that cracks down on sorcerers. Even though Seth did nothing wrong, he's arrested just for being a sorcerer.

episodes.title: Eichi to kibô no rakuen -Artemis-
episodes.plot: Immediately after arriving in Artemis Academy, Seth decides to take part in the ceremony welcoming new residents to the city. However, the founder of the academy, Master Lord Majesty, ends up saddling him with a certain immense penalty.

episodes.title: Chika suidô ni hisomu mono -Monster-
episodes.plot: As Doc is enjoying another peaceful afternoon drinking coffee at Miss Melba's café, he's suddenly pulled underground through a manhole by a tentacled beast.

episodes.title: Tsuyo-sa no shômei -Progress-
episodes.plot: Seth has rapidly gained more magical power, but he's gotten so used to it that his handling of magic has grown sloppy. To teach him a lesson, Yaga forces Seth to wear gloves that prevent magic use.

episodes.title: Omoide no hôki -Memory-
episodes.plot: It's been a month since Seth parted ways with Alma. A festival is about to be held in Artemis Academy, and Seth is excited by the joyous atmosphere.

episodes.title: Dôran jokyoku -Storm-
episodes.plot: Captain Konrad of the Inquisition convinces the people of Rumble Town that the accidents there have been caused by immigrants and sorcerers. Fueled by anger and fear, the town's residents lead an uprising, demanding the elimination of all infected people.

episodes.title: Sono Kobushi wa Ryuusei no You ni -Burst-
episodes.plot: Fifteen years ago, a young Hameline, having been infected, was imprisoned in Rumble Town along with three other infected children. When Major Oxumare of the Inquisition stands up for the children, a young Konrad kills him and frames the children.

episodes.title: Ima kazenone o tomete -Serenade-
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: Yami no ato no hikari -Awakening-
episodes.plot: Hameline is defeated by General Torque, "the Beast." The enraged Seth continues to fight, but Von Teppes of the Inquisition turns the tables on him.

episodes.title: Kimi ga kaeta sekai -Relief-
episodes.plot: When Seth and company return to Artemis Academy, they are welcomed as the heroes who exposed the misdeeds of an Inquisitor. But when Seth thinks about Hameline, and about his own actions in battle, he refuses to accept the town's accolades.

episodes.title: Yochô -Sign-
episodes.plot: With public trust in the Inquisition waning after their misdeeds were exposed in Rumble Town, there are no towns willing to provide Dragunov and his men with much-needed supplies.

episodes.title: Mirai o motomete -Utopia-
episodes.plot: Just when Seth decides to set out on a new journey, a massive number of Nemesis eggs rains down on Artemis Academy. The sorcerers of the city intercept them, but an egg they miss falls on an island where Melie happens to be gathering mushrooms.
